properties.Use of Water: Turag bridge area of the river are used as natural water fish farming and irrigation.
properties.Polution Source: This area is surrounded by water body and broad agricultural field. Pollutants from agricultural land mix with Turag water at the surrounding areas of this location. Branches of the Turag confluent with main Turag at Vawal.

properties.Name: Nama Bazar
properties.Location: Mashakuli Chak, Daulatpur, Baniachong, Habiganj, Sylhet
properties.Use of Water: Turag bridge area of the river are used as natural water fish farming and industrial cooling.
properties.Polution Source: Both industrial pollution and agricultural pollution happens here as industrial concentration is found at this locaiton.

properties.Name: Fatulla
properties.Location: Char Ishwardia, Char Ishwardia, Mymensingh Sadar, Mymensingh, Dhaka
properties.Use of Water: This portion of the river is used as water way transportation.
properties.Polution Source: Pollutants from agricultural land, industry, and commercial fish farming like Pangas Farm are major concerns of water pollution at this location.

properties.Name: Teesta Barrage
properties.Location: Madla, Madla, Bogra Sadar, Bogra, Rajshahi
properties.Use of Water: The major use of water is Irrigation, fisheries in natural water, and water way transportation.
properties.Polution Source: The major pollution source is widen agricultural field. Pesticide, insecticide, herbicide & chemical fertilizers are used in agriculture field and fish farms.

properties.Name: Nohali-Sapmari
properties.Location: Natai Para (Part-B), Shabgram, Bogra Sadar, Bogra, Rajshahi
properties.Use of Water: The major use of water is Irrigation, fisheries in natural water, and water way transportation.
properties.Polution Source: The major pollution source is widen agricultural field. Pesticide, insecticide, herbicide & chemical fertilizers are used in agriculture field and fish farms.

properties.Name: Teesta Bridge
properties.Location: Chilu Para, Shabgram, Bogra Sadar, Bogra, Rajshahi
properties.Use of Water: The major use of water is Irrigation, fisheries in natural water, and water way transportation.
properties.Polution Source: The major pollution source is widen agricultural field. Pesticide, insecticide, herbicide & chemical fertilizers are used in agriculture field and fish farms.

properties.Name: Banishanta
properties.Location: Saleshwar Kuna, Sheola, Beani Bazar, Sylhet, Sylhet
properties.Use of Water: Water used for industrial as well as domestic purposes. The large water vessel come from Chittagong port and discharge cargo at Mongal port at this locaiton.
properties.Polution Source: Water pollution happens from industrial effluents, Port sweage, run off from settelment areas and transportation discharge (lub oil nad grease, black oil).

properties.Name: Kaliakoir
properties.Location: , Ward No-23, Kotwali, Sylhet, Sylhet
properties.Use of Water: Use in agriculture for irrigation.
properties.Polution Source: Agriculture

properties.Name: Bishnandi
properties.Location: Batia, Sariakandi, Sariakandi, Bogra, Rajshahi
properties.Use of Water: Water at this point is used for irrigation through different canals.
properties.Polution Source: A few tributaries meet at this location with main stream of Meghna river. Very mild settlement and human intervention are seen at in this locality. Pollutants from agricultural field also contribute through a few canals.

properties.Name: BD-China Bridge
properties.Location: Char Pakshimari, Char Pakshimari, Sherpur Sadar, Sherpur, Dhaka
properties.Use of Water: This portion of the river is used as water way transportation.
properties.Polution Source: Bangladesh-China Friendship Bridge is located in industrial concentrated areas. The major portions of the industries located here are of red categories. A number of effluent outlets for industrial wastage discharge are found at this location.

properties.Name: Kauar Char Ferry Ghat
properties.Location: Nandirai, Kanaighat, Kanaighat, Sylhet, Sylhet
properties.Use of Water: Natural fishing ground, agricultural use and water way transportation key three aspect of water use in this locaiton.
properties.Polution Source: Runoff from agricultural field and residues of water transports cause water pollution.

properties.Name: Gab Khan Lunch Terminal
properties.Location: Palak, Sachna Bazar, Jamalganj, Sunamganj, Sylhet
properties.Use of Water: Open waer fishing, irrigation as well as domestic use of river water found at this locaiton.
properties.Polution Source: Water pollution happens from industrial effluents, run off from settelment areas and transportation discharge (lub oil nad grease, black oil).

properties.Name: Port Road
properties.Location: Ganeshpur, Dakshin Islampur, Chhatak, Sunamganj, Sylhet
properties.Use of Water: Use in industries as well as transport communication
properties.Polution Source: A canal from Hajiganj area meets with Shitalakhya carrying industrial pollutants. Many industries are concentrated around this location. Industries located at this area are fibre glass, screen printing, washing plants, pharmaceuticals, knit wears, garmen

properties.Name: Daprodopia Khea Ghat
properties.Location: Ibrahimpur, Rangar Char, Sunamganj Sadar, Sunamganj, Sylhet
properties.Use of Water: Open waer fishing, irrigation as well as domestic use of river water found at this locaiton.
properties.Polution Source: Water pollution happens from industrial effluents, run off from settelment areas and transportation discharge (lub oil nad grease, black oil).

properties.Name: Narshingdi Launch Terminal
properties.Location: Ujan Bochagari, Chandipur, Sundarganj, Gaibandha, Rajshahi
properties.Use of Water: This location is a Hilsha Fish Sanctuary and junction point of water way transportation.
properties.Polution Source: Narshingdi Launch Terminal is located in Narshingdi Pourashava in Narshingdi Sadar Thana. This is also flux tributary monitoring station. Industrial pollutants mix with Meghan water at this location. Water seen blakish here.

properties.Name: Bhairab Bazar
properties.Location: Tista, Gokunda, Lalmonirhat Sadar, Lalmonirhat, Rajshahi

properties.Name: Bakail Bridge (Titas)
properties.Location: Taluk Saulmari, Saulmari, Jaldhaka, Nilphamari, Rajshahi
properties.Use of Water: Agricultural and Industrial (Brick Field) purpose.
properties.Polution Source: Agriculture field and Brick Field

properties.Name: Titas Rail Bridge
properties.Location: Doani Pittiphata, Goddimari, Hatibandha, Lalmonirhat, Rajshahi
properties.Use of Water: Irrigation purpose
properties.Polution Source: Pesticide, Chemical fertilizer use for agriculture.
